title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5119.3 - Voucher standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5119.3 - Voucher standards

State Regulations
(a) Vouchers shall provide the following information regarding each voucher printed
that can be obtained from the video lottery terminal, an interface board, the
central system, or another means approved in writing by the commission: (1)
value of credits in local monetary units
in numerical form; (2)
time of day
the video lottery gaming ticket was printed; (3)
date, in any recognized format, indicating the day, month, and year; (4)
unique validation number, and/or barcode; and
(5)
video lottery gaming agent
location. (b) A
commission approved system shall be used to validate the voucher, and the video
lottery gaming ticket information recorded by the central system shall be
retained for at least as long as the voucher is valid at that location, or as
otherwise required by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5119.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
